entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,352Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 62

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power—and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he’s determined to protect the Stilinski legacy—even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family—feared for their near-feral strength—emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox’s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,506Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 4

Summary: What if vampires existed in the already cramped supernatural town more commonly known as Beacon Hills? Roderick Hauk is the only known vampire in town, and he's about to regret it. entry.title: "It'll Be So Easy"
entry.summary:
Author: Book_Sniffer

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,015Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 9

Summary: The Hale Murder House isn't haunted. Obviously. That notion is just ridiculous. Some homeless person might have taken shelter there, if the stories are to be believed and why wouldn't they? It's enormous, it mostly still stands and it has been years since the fire that wiped out most of the Hale family. So many years. It's nothing. Not really even a murder house, people are just being superstitious. So what if it's a full moon, Beacon Hills is boring and you might as well take a look at it. What's the worst that could happen?

entry.title: The Wolf at Winter’s Door
entry.summary:
Author: DarkInsanity (Stereklenidus)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,925Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 41

Summary: Winter is closing in on the Hale valley when Derek—an exiled alpha turned recluse—finds a half-frozen omega and a baby in the snow outside his cottage. He should have left them to the storm; he’s learned what kindness costs. But the sound of the infant’s cry, and the scent of something wild and familiar in the omega’s skin, pull at the part of him that still remembers how to protect, how to care, how to love.As the snow deepens and the fire burns low, Derek’s solitude unravels thread by thread.The omega’s name is Stiles—a runaway from a war Derek has long tried to forget. He carries secrets, grief, and a child who isn’t meant to survive the winter.In a world of fading magic, hunters, and ghosts of kingdoms lost to fire, two wounded souls find warmth in each other’s silence.But the past always finds its way through the snow.

entry.title: Holiday Hell
entry.summary:
Author: ieatassforbreakfast009

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,064Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 95

Summary: All Stiles wanted was to give the Hale Pack a normal holiday season—tree decorating, sugar cookies, and zero supernatural explosions. Unfortunately, the wolves are competitive about everything, Derek is allergic to fun, and Stiles’ spark might actually explode from holiday stress. Still, if it means giving the pack a family again, Stiles is willing to drag them through holiday hell… one disaster at a time.

entry.title: Hard to Kill
entry.summary:
Author: Lalaith_Quetzalli

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,681Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 66

Summary: Mieczyslaw Jan Gajos Stilinski was born into a lineage of power, and duty. With the power and will to carry on the legacy of his ancestors, and more. And no matter who gets in his way, who tries to push him back, to take him down, in the end he will always be the last one standing. For even if he might be only human, in this world of magic and monsters, he knows that humans can sometimes be stronger than even gods…
